tasks.title: Add interactive artifact strategy choice and persist config
tasks.body: Feedback: prompt during release for artifact strategy (tag tarball vs GitHub Release assets) and persist choice to config.

tasks.title: EPIC: UX & Safety
tasks.body: Scope: prompt flows, preview/confirm UX, error strategy, atomic writes.\nDoD: Epics only; child tasks define acceptance criteria.

tasks.title: Specify preview/diff output for multi-repo changes
Define preview/confirm UX contract + atomic writes
EPIC: Release & Artifacts
tasks.body: Scope: release discovery, asset selection, checksums, idempotency, git flow.\nDoD: Epics only; child tasks define acceptance criteria.

tasks.title: Design release orchestration flow + idempotency
Define version/tag precedence + validation
Define checksum acquisition limits + retries

tasks.title: Add --non-interactive flag to bd release/doctor
tasks.body: Scope: PRD non-interactive contract. Add flags to CLI; gate release required-field checks/asset selection by --non-interactive; update tests.

tasks.title: Finalize non-interactive contract (init/release/doctor)
tasks.body:
Scope: PRD A3.
DoD:
- Required fields per command with autodetect sources.
- Exact error text + exit codes for missing inputs.
- Update docs table with final contract.

tasks.title: Make bd release interactive when no inputs provided
tasks.body: Feedback: if bd release is run with no other input, enter interactive flow to gather version/tag/release inputs for deploying a release.

tasks.title: Add optional GitHub Release creation for release-asset
tasks.body: Feedback: new flags --create-release/--no-create-release; when enabled and release missing create tag then GitHub Release; check .gitconfig for commit/push capability; fail with clear message when GITHUB_TOKEN/GH_TOKEN missing; support in interactive mode.

tasks.title: Implement tag-first release flow for source-tarball
tasks.body: Feedback: source-tarball strategy should not require GitHub Release; if --version omitted in interactive mode prompt; create tag (unless --skip-tag) before tap updates.

tasks.title: Prompt for version in interactive release when omitted
tasks.body: Feedback: in interactive release, if --version is omitted prompt for version; keep non-interactive strict (require --version).

tasks.title: Add tests/docs for create-release behavior
Add --create-release/--no-create-release flags and wire release flow
Define preview/diff output for multi-repo changes
tasks.body:
Scope: PRD E18b.
DoD:
- Diff format examples and ordering rules.
- Dry-run output contract across CLI + tap repos.
- Messaging for no-op changes.

tasks.title: Specify preview/confirm UX + atomic writes
tasks.body:

DoD:
- Atomic write/rollback spec.
- Preview/confirm steps for init/release.
- Temp file strategy and cleanup rules.

tasks.title: Add GitHubClient create_release API helper
tasks.body:
Scope: release creation support for sv-mrc.
Acceptance:
- Add GitHubClient.create_release with request payload + error mapping.
- Token missing error message is release-specific.
- Unit tests cover request serialization for optional fields.

tasks.title: Improve release error messaging for missing release/version
tasks.body: Feedback: if release-asset and no release exists, suggest creating a release or switching to source-tarball; if source-tarball and version missing in non-interactive mode, require --version with clear error.

tasks.title: Update release preview output with planned actions
tasks.body: Feedback: preview should explicitly state will create tag, will update tap formula, and (if enabled) will create GitHub Release.

tasks.title: Specify formula naming + class normalization rules
tasks.body:
Scope: PRD B6.
DoD:
- Transformation rules + validation.
- At least 8 examples (acronyms, digits, dashes, underscores).
- Exact error messages for invalid names.

tasks.title: Design release orchestration + idempotency + dry-run UX
tasks.body:
Scope: PRD C11.

- Step-by-step flow with idempotency matrix.

- Exact error messages/exit codes for common failures.

tasks.body:

Scope: PRD version update strategy open question.
DoD:

- Ensure behavior is deterministic and covered by tests in src/version_update.rs.
- Record any required user decision in USER_TODO.md.

Scope: PRD C10f.

- Exit code mapping for mismatches.

tasks.title: Decide prerelease selection policy with --include-prerelease
tasks.body:
Scope: PRD release discovery open question.
DoD:
- Decide whether --include-prerelease chooses latest overall or prefers stable when available.
- Update docs/release-discovery.md and relevant tests in src/host/github.rs.
- Capture decision in USER_TODO.md if user input required.

tasks.title: Default bd init artifact strategy to source-tarball
tasks.body: Feedback: bd init defaults should set [artifact].strategy = "source-tarball" (tag tarball). In interactive mode, prompt and default to source-tarball if needed.

tasks.title: Add tests for interactive release prompts and tag-first flows
tasks.body: Feedback: add tests for interactive version prompt when omitted, source-tarball flow not requiring GitHub Release, and release-asset flow creating a GitHub Release when missing (mocked API).

tasks.title: Update docs/examples for tag-first defaults
tasks.body: Feedback: update README, docs/config.example.toml, docs/release-discovery.md, docs/release-orchestration.md to reflect tag-first/source-tarball defaults.

tasks.title: Use repo autodetect metadata as fallback in release preflight
tasks.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- validate_release_preflight and resolve_release_context fall back to ctx.repo.metadata for project fields (description/homepage/license/bin/name) and host owner/repo when config values are missing.
- tap.formula remains required and is not auto-derived from metadata to avoid ambiguous formula updates.
- Add unit tests covering metadata fallback for host owner/repo and project fields.
- cargo test passes.

tasks.title: Preflight git state and existing tags before asset downloads
tasks.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- After release discovery but before any asset download/checksum work, validate git prerequisites.
- If --skip-tag is false, ensure the tag is absent before downloads.
- When --allow-dirty is false, fail on dirty tap/CLI repos before downloads.
- Add a test that proves the asset download endpoint is not hit when the tag already exists.
- cargo test passes.

tasks.title: Align git remote selection docs with implementation
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- docs/git-integration.md reflects the actual remote selection order and error messages used in src/git.rs.
- Include the tap/cli context-specific guidance strings.
Notes: PRD requires exact user-facing errors.

tasks.title: Fix duplicate latest-release error message
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- When no releases exist, error text is exactly: 'no GitHub releases found for <owner>/<repo>'.
- Add/adjust unit test in src/host/github.rs to cover empty release list.
Notes: PRD release-discovery exact errors.

tasks.title: Validate SPDX license identifiers in config and init
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- config validation rejects unknown SPDX license identifiers with exit code 3 (InvalidInput).
- bd init validates provided/prompted license values against SPDX identifiers.
- Error message suggests using a valid SPDX identifier.
- cargo test passes with new coverage.

tasks.title: Warn when formula sha256 uses placeholder TODO
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- doctor treats sha256 values containing 'TODO' (case-insensitive) as a warning by default.
- --strict fails when placeholder sha256 is present.
- Tests cover placeholder detection without breaking existing valid sha256 fixtures.

tasks.title: Silence git helper command output
tasks.body:
Problem: git helper tests emit git commit/init output to stdout because they use Command::status().
Acceptance:
- git module tests do not print git init/commit output during cargo test.
- Helper functions capture stdout/stderr via Command::output() and include diagnostics only on failure.
- cargo test passes.

tasks.title: EPIC: CLI Core
tasks.body: Foundation implementation tasks for the Rust CLI (arg parsing, shared context, error handling).

tasks.title: Pre-check existing git tags before release writes
tasks.body:
Problem: `bd release` checks for existing tags only when creating the tag, after writes/commits. This can leave partial changes when a tag already exists.

Acceptance criteria:
- When a tag would be created, detect an existing tag before any filesystem writes/commits.
- Error message matches the existing tag guidance.
- Tests cover the early failure path without external network access.

tasks.title: Allow release asset auto-selection without explicit asset selection in non-dry-run
tasks.body:
Problem: `bd release` currently requires `artifact.asset_name` or `artifact.asset_template` even for non-dry-run releases, blocking the PRD fallback asset selection rules.

Acceptance criteria:
- Non-dry-run `release-asset` strategy does not require explicit asset selection fields.
- `--dry-run` continues to require explicit `asset_name` or `asset_template` (no network).
- Missing-field errors remain clear and CI-friendly.
- Tests cover both dry-run and non-dry-run behaviors.

tasks.title: Document multi-repo preview and commit order in release
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- docs/release-orchestration.md reflects version-update planning before preview
- step order shows multi-repo preview, then commits, then pushes
- doc mentions early git-root validation for non-dry-run

tasks.title: Integrate version_update planning into bd release preview
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- bd release previews CLI repo version changes alongside tap formula changes
- no CLI repo writes/commits occur before preview succeeds
- a failure after planning (e.g., missing template) leaves CLI repo files unchanged
- add tests covering the atomicity guarantee

tasks.title: Plan version_update changes for preview and atomic apply
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- version_update can compute planned changes without writing files
- planned changes include path + new content for preview
- non-interactive errors are unchanged and validated before any writes
- release can abort before writes when planning fails

tasks.title: Define latest release selection when --include-prerelease is set
tasks.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Make selection order explicit when include_prerelease=true: choose latest non-draft release even if prerelease.
- Keep stable-only behavior for include_prerelease=false.
- Add focused tests in host/github.rs covering drafts, stable, prerelease ordering.

tasks.title: Implement configurable checksum download policy
tasks.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Add config fields for checksum download limits/retries/timeouts with safe defaults.
- Wire limits into release checksum downloads for both release assets and source tarballs.
- Validate inputs with clear invalid-input errors.
- Document defaults in docs/config.example.toml.
- Add unit tests for config parsing + defaulting behavior.

tasks.title: Add bd template command for template preview/validation
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- New 'bd template' subcommand prints the default formula template with placeholders.
- When given --validate <path>, it validates required placeholders using existing formula rendering checks.
- cargo test passes with coverage for the new command.

tasks.title: Improve git remote selection errors with tap/cli context
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Remote selection errors reference the relevant config knob (tap.remote or cli.remote) and flags.
- Multiple-remote ambiguity messages are actionable and specific.
- cargo test passes with updated unit tests in git module.

tasks.title: Add brewdistillery binary alias alongside bd
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Cargo builds both 'bd' and 'brewdistillery' binaries from the same entrypoint.
- README and help text remain consistent with bd shorthand.
- cargo test passes.

tasks.title: Refine init --import-formula overwrite policy
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Formula fields remain source-of-truth; config fills gaps only.
- Non-interactive mode requires --force to overwrite config or formula outputs.
- Add tests around overwrite guards and merge precedence.

tasks.title: Improve multi-repo preview/diff summaries
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Preview output clearly labels repo roots and modified paths.
- Dry-run output is stable and easy to diff in CI logs.
- Add snapshot-style tests for preview summaries.

tasks.title: Harden release idempotency around tags and assets
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- When a tag already exists, the error is deterministic and suggests --skip-tag.
- When a release exists but assets are missing, the error calls out asset selection guidance.
- Add tests for existing-tag and missing-asset scenarios.

tasks.title: Clarify Cargo workspace version_update defaults
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Document and enforce a single default policy when both [package] and [workspace.package] exist.
- Provide clear error guidance when cargo_package is required.
- Add tests covering root package, workspace.package-only, and member-package updates.

tasks.title: Enforce git remote selection rules consistently
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Remote selection behavior matches docs/git-remotes.md for origin preference and ambiguity errors.
- Non-interactive errors suggest explicit --host-owner/--host-repo overrides.
- Add tests for origin, single non-origin remote, and ambiguous remotes.

tasks.title: Validate per-target asset config and formula mapping
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Target keys (e.g., darwin/arm64) are validated before any network calls.
- Per-target config produces correct Homebrew DSL for macOS/Linux and CPU predicates.
- Add tests for invalid keys and expected formula output.

tasks.title: Tighten non-interactive required-field validation
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Each command reports missing required fields in a single, stable error message.
- Validation happens before any writes, clones, or network calls.
- Add tests asserting required-field errors and exit codes.

tasks.title: Handle metadata conflicts interactively
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Repo detection records conflicting manifest fields instead of erroring in interactive init.
- Init prints concise conflict hints and prompts for explicit values.
- Non-interactive commands fail fast with actionable conflict errors (exit code 3).
- Add unit tests for both interactive-allowed and non-interactive conflict paths.

tasks.title: EPIC: Init Workflow
tasks.body: Implementation tasks for bd init interactive and non-interactive flows, tap setup, and formula bootstrap.

tasks.title: Make bd release dry-run network-free
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- --dry-run must not clone tap remotes or call GitHub APIs.
- When inputs required for networkless dry-run are missing, fail fast with a clear message (exit code 2 or 3).
- Require explicit --version/--tag and asset selection (asset_name/asset_template or per-target overrides) for release-asset strategy in dry-run.
- Use deterministic placeholder SHA values (e.g. DRY-RUN) and compute URLs locally.
- Add tests proving dry-run skips cloning (tap remote may be invalid) and surfaces missing-input errors without network.

tasks.title: Implement GitHub tap repo creation in bd init
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Add an explicit flag (e.g. --create-tap) to bd init.
- When requested, create the tap repo via GitHub API using env token only.
- On success, set tap.remote from API response and reuse existing clone/path resolution.
- Provide clear errors for missing token, invalid tap owner/repo, and conflicting flags (e.g. --tap-new).
- Add unit tests covering the flag validation and tap.remote inference path.

tasks.title: Specify GitHub API tap creation flow
tasks.body:

- API flow steps/diagram.
- Fallback behavior when token missing.
Notes: PRD D13 (status: open).

tasks.title: Implement git remote selection for push + shell git module
tasks.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Introduce a dedicated git module that shells out to git CLI (documented decision).
- Remote selection prefers a configured remote URL when it matches a named remote.
- Otherwise: prefer origin, else single remote, else fail with actionable message.
- Push/tag operations use the shared remote selection logic.
- Unit tests cover: configured-remote match, origin fallback, single remote fallback, and ambiguity error.

tasks.title: TMP test
tasks.body: tmp

tasks.title: EPIC: Identity & Config
tasks.body: Scope: identity resolution + config schema + metadata detection.\nDoD: Epics only; child tasks define acceptance criteria.

tasks.title: Align asset selection error messages with spec (target-aware)
tasks.body:
Make asset selection errors match docs/asset-selection.md and include target context.

Acceptance criteria:
- Explicit asset_name and asset_template errors match documented wording.
- Ambiguity errors reference the target and guidance.
- Add unit tests for error wording and ambiguity.

tasks.title: Enforce release non-interactive asset requirements + target validation
tasks.body:
Bring release non-interactive validation in line with docs/non-interactive.md and docs/asset-selection.md.

Acceptance criteria:
- For artifact.strategy=release-asset, require asset_name/asset_template globally or via artifact.targets overrides before any network calls.
- Validate artifact.targets key-shape consistency (<os> vs <os>-<arch>) before release discovery.
- Provide canonical missing-field errors via AppError::MissingConfig.
- Add unit tests for missing asset selection and mixed target shapes.

tasks.title: Implement config schema v1 round-trip + schema_version default
tasks.body:
Implement v1 config persistence details from docs/config.md.

Acceptance criteria:
- Unknown fields are preserved within each section (e.g., [project], [tap], [artifact.targets.*]).
- schema_version defaults to 1 when saving a config without a schema_version.
- Config validation still enforces allowed enums and non-empty bin entries.
- Add unit tests covering nested unknown-field round-trips and schema_version defaulting.

tasks.title: Add tests for version_update modes
Implement version_update modes in bd release
Implement source-tarball release strategy
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- Support artifact.strategy="source-tarball" in bd release.
- Compute tarball URL from release.tarball_url_template (placeholders: {owner}, {repo}, {tag}, {version}) or default to GitHub refs/tags URL.
- Compute SHA256 via existing download helper; honor --dry-run.
- Require/derive tag + version; if missing, fall back to latest GitHub Release tag.
- Reject asset_name/asset_template/targets when using source-tarball with clear error.
